Class ReportManager

java.lang.Object
ReportManager
public class ReportManager extends Object
Manages loading data and orchestrating the generation and presentation of report artifacts Responsibilities include: Loading income/expense data for a given year Producing monthly, category, and yearly summaries Computing overall balance figures Exporting summaries to CSV and displaying reports on screen

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportManager

      public ReportManager()

  • Method Details

    • loadYearlyData

      public void loadYearlyData(int year)
      Loads all income and expense records for the specified year into memory so that summaries can be produced without additional I/O.
      Parameters:
      year - the four-digit year to load (e.g., 2025)

    • generateMonthlySummary

      public Map<Integer, BigDecimal> generateMonthlySummary(int year)
      Aggregates totals by month for the previously loaded year.
      Parameters:
      year - the four-digit year corresponding to the loaded dataset
      Returns:
      an immutable mapping of Month → total amount (expenses can be negative)

    • generateCategorySummary

      public Map<String, BigDecimal> generateCategorySummary(int year)
      Aggregates totals by category label, eg. "Rent", "Groceries".
      Parameters:
      year - the four-digit year corresponding to the loaded dataset
      Returns:
      an immutable mapping of Category → total amount

    • generateYearlySummary

      public ReportManager.YearlySummary generateYearlySummary(int year)
      Produces year-wide totals for income, expenses, and net balance.
      Parameters:
      year - the four-digit year corresponding to the loaded dataset
      Returns:
      a ReportManager.YearlySummary struct containing key totals

    • calculateBalance

      public BigDecimal calculateBalance(int year)
      Calculates the overall balance for the specified year (totalIncome - totalExpenses).
      Parameters:
      year - the four-digit year corresponding to the loaded dataset
      Returns:
      net balance for the year

    • exportReportToCSV

      public void exportReportToCSV(File outputfile)
      Exports the active summaries to a CSV file at the provided path.
      Parameters:
      outputFile - target path for the CSV file, parent directories should exist

    • displayReportOnScreen

      public void displayReportOnScreen()
      Renders the most recent summaries to the the console generate summaries prior to calling.
